div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Circle Continuous Learning Plan (CLP) Resource Center #thrivein375
Through the THRIVE program, Circle students will be given the opportunity to gain high school credit while advancing toward a college degree. Read the full story:...
Congratulations to Harrison Metzger & Ashlie Weber as they both represent the top 1% of high school seniors! We are proud of you! ...
Thank you to the Butler County Health Dept. for the fun activities bag to hand out to kids at lunch pick up! Much appreciated! #t ...
